Civil Service Commission Meeting Agendas and Minutes

The City of Brier Civil Service Commission holds regular meetings at 7:00 p.m. on the first Wednesday of each month at Brier City Hall, 2901 228th St. SW.

Special meetings shall be held at such times and places as may be determined by the commission.
